item.title: Hitler Parodies
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

the1337legend:

I was regarding the fact, some people find it offensive for people to re produce things someone says, that whom might believe did good for the world (if they believed that), and toward the fact, people think that hitler was a joke, and everything that happened during his time, was bullshit and shits and giggles.

Hitler was amazing… Don’t diss him. [size=1pt]Joking… He be gay[/size]

WWII was a war that I won’t forget. I watch movies about it all the time, and its fine to reproduce what Hitler says because he is a jew hater… That whole antisemitism was fucking retarded, why would you kill people because of the way they look? If he was around today I am sure that people would kill him for it.

Read full topic
